course_description: There's street crime. There's white-collar crime. And then there's crime in the home. This includes domestic violence, sexual crimes, and crimes against vulnerable people. This doctrinal course aims to provide in-depth familiarity with the laws prohibiting such offenses and governing their investigation, adjudication, and punishment. We will also discuss the social, psychological, cultural, and other factors that drive family violence.
sections: Class Nbr: 6326, Section #: 002, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: W 2-4p, Instructor: M. Cavedon, Status: Open
